channel.title: Client help?
channel.description:
Hey guys, recently, my friend and I, Raymyn, decided to start a server. Well, when I downloaded our first client version it wouldn't open. Well...it would open for a millisecond then close. Each time I opened it did so. I re-downloaded, same thing. Restarted me computer, still.
I was wondering if any of the good chaps here could help me out?
Thanks, Cramer

item.title: Client help?
item.dc:creator: @Cramer Cramer
item.description:
@Cramer wrote:

It worked, but I made the mistake of replacing the 12 with 11 in the path for me java.

Read full topic

item.title: Client help?
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Right click “run” or whatever yours is called and then click edit…At the end of everything put “pause”.

Read full topic
